setSettingsTopologyCompleteConnection() - Method in class com.dkriesel.snipe.core.NeuralNetworkDescriptor

setSettingsTopologyFeedForward() - Method in class com.dkriesel.snipe.core.NeuralNetworkDescriptor
Allows only forward synapses.
setSettingsTopologyFeedForwardWithShortcuts() - Method in class com.dkriesel.snipe.core.NeuralNetworkDescriptor
Allows only forward synapses and forward shortcut synapses.
setSettingsTopologyHopfield() - Method in class com.dkriesel.snipe.core.NeuralNetworkDescriptor
Allows every possible connection but no self connections (those towards bias neuron and input neurons, however, remain impossible).

setSynapse(int, int, double) - Method in class com.dkriesel.snipe.core.NeuralNetwork
Updates or randomly chooses the synaptic weight value from the neuron i to neuron j (computational effort: O(log(MIN(I_out,J_in))))) - If the synapse doesn't exist, it is added, if it is allowed (worst case computational effort: O(NEURONS*log(NEURONS))).
